tx.label: You have {{tx_cnt}} transaction(s) to confirm
tx.caption: Expand each transaction to reveal more details
tx.review: Please review the transaction before confirming

dv.hw: Please confirm public key extraction on {{device}} device

keystone.qrscan: Scan QR code with your Keystone device
keystone.distance: Adjust distance and optionally tap on Keystone QR code to improve scanning

info.signdownload: The transaction has been confirmed by all available accounts but still missing needed witnesses. If its a Multi-Sig wallet transaction, please download and share the transaction with the other participants.

error.expired: Unable to submit! Transaction life time has expired. Please recreate the transaction with a new expiration date (TTL).
error.auxDataMismatch: There is a mismatch between the attached metadata and the hash requested to sign. The metadata you see for this transaction is not what you sign!
error.debug: For further support, please open a Discord ticket with debug data downloaded.
error.unknownInputs: Unable to calculate accurate transaction balance due to unknown inputs.
error.doubleSpend: Invalid transaction list, input utxo is spent more than 'once':
error.missingKeys: Transaction(s) does not need any witnesses from available account(s). If already confirmed, please close and submit.
error.locked: Transaction(s) attempt to spend one or more of your manually locked UTxOs.
error.passwordMismatch: Entered passwords does not match, please retry!
